resources.string:
You are stranded in space on a space shuttle. 
There was a malfunction in the thrusters and the shuttle 
has spun off course. 
You have limited fuel. 
Use the thrusters control panel to adjust your trajectory 
and keep you on target.

There are 3 rounds to each game 
You have a 10 move limit. 
Both players can see the controls, only the active player 
can use the controls. 
Once the target has been met, activate thrusters and move 
onto the next round.

Press buttons to move the fuel volumes 
Game stats on left 
Player stats on right 
Press open button then activate button to 
submit and check if you win that round.

Puzzle 1 - Button 1, Button 10, Button 1 

Puzzle 2 - Button 2 

Puzzle 3 - Button 6, Button 12, Button 8, 
Button 12, Button 6, Button 12, Button 8, Button 2, Button 8
